price: Narababwiye nti “Nimusabe imbabazi Nyagasani wanyu, mu by’ukuri ni We uhebuje mu kubabarira ibyaha.”
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
